name: Flyto
description:
Do you enjoy the pure experience of flying?
Sense the freedom of flying,
the thrill of speed,
The excitement of competition,
The peace of being together,
The challenge of hunting,
And the flow of life
Why FLYTO?
It's the first high quality game you play as a bird and interact with other birds.
It's the first bird game with a realistic look.
It's the first game that combines flying , racing and RPG elements.
We discovered a new sense of playing by combining excitement and calm.
Features:
1. Nice mechanics of Flying
2. Experience exciting Racing
3. Hunting
4. Bird simulation
5. Make a custom race
6. Relaxation mode

A nice story mode will be available soon
